# 1.
\(r = 0.02 m\) \
\(N = 500\) \
\(d = 0.4 m\) \
\(I = 5 A\) \
\(S = \pi \times r^2\) \
\(S = 0.00126 m^2\) \
\(E = \frac{1}{2} \times L \times I^2\) \
\(E = \frac{1}{2} \times \frac{N^2 \times \mu \times S \times I^2}{d}\) \
\(E = \frac{1}{2} \times \frac{500^2 \times 4 * \pi * 10^-7 \times 0.00126 \times 25}{0.4}\) \
\(E = 0.012 J\) \ 

# 2.
\(I = 100 A \) \ 
\(L = 0.05 H \) \
\(E = 0.5 \times L \times I^2 \) \
\(E = 0.5 \times 0.05 \times 10000\) \
\(E = 250 J\)

# 3.
\(\Delta\phi = 0.008 Wb\) \
\(\Delta t = 0.4 s\) \ 
\(U = \frac{\Delta \phi}{\Delta t} \) \
\(U = \frac{0.008}{0.4} \) \ 
\(U = 0.02 V\) \ 

# 4.
\(\Delta I = 0.5 A\) \
\(\Delta t = 0.01 s\) \
\(U = 80 V\) \
\(L = -U \times \frac{\Delta t}{\Delta I}\) \
\(L = -80 \times \frac{0.01}{0.5}\) \
\(L = -1.6 H\) \
